Row.Text: +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route with a different Civilization or City-State, increasing by +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] each Era. Other Civilizations gain +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route sent to Morocco.

A Kasbah can only be built on a Desert tile. It provides +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. It also provides the same +50% defense bonus as a Fort. Must be built in Moroccan territory.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]A Kasbah can only be built on a Desert tile. It provides +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. It also provides the same +50% defense bonus as a Fort. Must be built in Moroccan territory.
